name: Cirrus Business
description:
In this wholesome community-focused adventure, Cloudi is tasked with restoring nature to its original pristine state.


This is accomplished by cultivating and upgrading an assortment of magical crops.


However, watch out for the slobsters - they don’t take kindly to a clean environment!


Luckily, Cloudi has a squad of loyal friends to help out.

Unique Features of Cirrus Business

  • Story-Driven Farming: Experience a unique farming simulator that weaves an engaging narrative with several possible endings.
  • Dynamic Farming System: Manage upgradeable crops in a highly dynamic system, requiring players to balance enemy generation and resource production for a challenging yet rewarding experience.
  • Character Abilities: Each character comes with unique abilities intricately interwoven into the farming system, adding layers of strategy to the gameplay.
  • Community Focus: Immerse yourself in a heartwarming sense of neighborly community, enhanced by cutscenes that bring characters together and unfold a coherent story.
  • Handcrafted Aesthetics: Enjoy a cozy aesthetic as all assets and music are created from scratch, contributing to a heartfelt gaming experience. :)
